statements: UPDATE player_statistics SET goals_scored = 10, games_played = 5 WHERE player_id = 1;
UPDATE player_statistics SET assists = 3, tackles_made = 8 WHERE player_name = 'Messi';
UPDATE player_statistics SET games_played = 20, goals_scored = 15 WHERE player_id = 1;
UPDATE player_statistics SET assists = 5, tackles_made = 10, player_name = 'John Doe' WHERE player_id = 3;
UPDATE player_stats SET age = 28, height = 6.00 WHERE player_id = 1001;
UPDATE performance_data SET performance_score = 95 WHERE player_id = 1002 AND session_date = '2022-10-15';
UPDATE player_stats SET age = 28, height = 6.00, weight = 190.50 WHERE player_id = 101;
UPDATE performance_data SET performance_score = 85, performance_metric = 'Speed' WHERE player_id = 202 AND session_date = '2023-09-15';
UPDATE player_statistics SET player_name = 'John Doe', player_team = 'Team A' WHERE player_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE player_performance SET score = 85, date_played = '2022-09-15' WHERE player_id = '888a4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE player_statistics SET player_team = 'Barcelona', player_position = 'Forward' WHERE player_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE player_performance SET score = 90, distance_covered = 12.5, calories_burned = 500.75 WHERE player_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001' AND date_played = '2022-01-15';
UPDATE player_stats SET age = 25, height = 180.5 WHERE player_id = 1;
UPDATE achievements SET date_achieved = '2022-09-15', achievement_name = 'Winner' WHERE player_id = 3;
UPDATE player_stats SET age = 25, weight = 75.5 WHERE player_id = 1;
UPDATE game_performance SET score = 100, duration = 60 WHERE game_id = 2;
UPDATE player_stats SET weight = 200, jersey_number = 23 WHERE player_id = 1;
UPDATE team_stats SET total_wins = total_wins + 1, total_losses = total_losses - 1 WHERE team_id = 5;
UPDATE player_stats SET height = 6.2, weight = 200 WHERE player_id = 101;
UPDATE team_stats SET coach_name = 'John Smith', location = 'New York City' WHERE team_id = 201;
